utility.name: Kali Linux Metapackage: kali-linux-everything
utility.author: Z. Cliffe Schreuders
utility.description: Installs a collection of software onto Kali. kali-linux-full When you download a Kali Linux ISO, you are essentially downloading an installation that has the kali-linux-full metapackage installed. This package includes all of the tools you are familiar with in Kali. Installation Size: 9.0 GB
